Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LsDef2 (L. serricorne defensin 2, natural AMPs,  insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S; UCSS1a; inactive: LsDef1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (35.48%) toDefensin 1. A: 13%. GRAVY: 0.41; M Wt: 9475.141; M formula:  C413H667N107O124, mol ex coeff: 1927.5. It contains seven cysteines. May form dimers.Activity: activity was demonstrated by both agar diffusion assay and microdilution assays. Active against  S. aureus ATCC25923 (MIC 60 ug/ml), E.coli ATCC25922 (MIC >160 ug/ml), and  C.albicans CMCC(F)98001 (MIC > 160 ug/ml).Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: established to get the peptide for this study.GeneBank: gene sequences can be donlownedMW751544.
Literature Information.Author: Zhang Y, Yan Y, Smagghe G, Yang H, Dai RH, Yang WJ.2023
Literature Information.Title: Identification and immune analysis of antimicrobial peptides from the cigarette beetle (Lasioderma serricorne).
